item.title: Linux Setup
item.author: 作者
item.description: 最近在因為進實驗室有一台桌機可以灌系統，然後一開始灌了 Ubuntu ，但是不知道發生什麼事突然掛掉，所以我就生氣打算重新灌一個系統。經過實驗室學長的推薦

item.title: [Paper Note] - How to read paper
item.author: 作者
item.description: Paper resource How to read Paper Three-Pass Apporach general idea paper’s content (not details) understand paper in depth First pass Following step title, abstract, introduction section, sub-section headings conclusions glance reference, ticking off that have been read Figure out Category: Which kind of paper is it? Context: related to? Correctness: Do the assumptions appear to be valid Contributions: main contributions Clarity: well written?
